Judul: SOME ASPECT OF DISPERSION COMPENSATING FIBER AS A SOLUTION TO DISPERSION IN FIBER COMMUNICATION
Abstrak:
Abstract : 
This thesis is based on the dispersion compensation method by cascading a single mode fiber (SMF) operating the 1550 nm wavelength with a dispersion compensating fiber (DCF) and the erbium doped fiber amplifiers (EDFA). By calculating the real length, managing the non-linear effects in a fiber adjusting the negative dispersion and the repeater span. A data rate of 10 Gbit/s is under consideration and a suitable simulation methodology has been used to achieve the work.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Supervisor:Andrianto Handojo, Prof.Dr.Ir.Supervisor 2 :Ian Yosef, Ir., MT Scan :Hidayat (2006-07-26)
